# GameLiminals - Adamas University Game Development Club

> The official game development hub of Adamas University, empowering the next generation of creators through a dynamic, responsive ecosystem.

## Core Features
- Smart Event Engine: Real-time updates via Firebase, automated ticketing, and QR-based validation.
- Live Team Directory: Dynamic member cards with real-time availability status (Online/Busy/Away).
- Exclusive Member Portal: Induction system restricted to Adamas University students.
- Scalable Admin Panel: Custom dashboard for real-time content and member management.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+).
- Backend: Firebase Realtime Database & Storage.
- Hosting: Vercel.

## Site Structure
- Home: https://gameliminals.vercel.app/ (Announcements & Hero)
- About: https://gameliminals.vercel.app/about (Mission & Journey)
- Events: https://gameliminals.vercel.app/events (Live events from Firebase)
- Team: https://gameliminals.vercel.app/team (Member directory)
- Projects: https://gameliminals.vercel.app/projects (Coming Soon - Member-built games)
